ChallengeShortDescription: Take advantage of the 'They Win, We Win' promotion at your local Chick Shack during baseball season and be the fan to get the most out of our home team's success!
ChallengeDescription: During this year's baseball season, your local Chicken Shack will offer a free chicken sandwich to all fans after a home team win.
ChallengeTermsAndConditions: Customer must present a valid game ticket in which the home team won the game, within 48 hours after the win, to receive the free chicken sandwich. Game participants earn a point for each free chicken sandwich they receive during the baseball season. The customer who received the most free chicken sandwiches at the end of the challenge is the winner!

ChallengeShortDescription: Visit each of the 50 US States
ChallengeDescription: Travel the US and be the first to stay with us in each of the 50 states.
ChallengeTermsAndConditions: Member must have at least one night stay at a Fall River property to qualify.
